revised_title: Integrated Pest Management in Apple Production: Selective Use of Crop Protection Chemicals
tldr: This article discusses the use of crop protection chemicals for integrated pest control in apple production. It explores the development of selective pesticides and methods for reducing pesticide use while conserving natural enemies. The article also highlights the importance of resistance management in an entire apple arthropod pest-natural enemy complex.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Ecology and Ecosystems
